DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis 1 . Consumers disabilities co-occurring SUD receive IPS likely competitively employ ( defined 1 day work past 30 day ) 3 , 6 12 month follow initiation vocational treatment goal compare group receive standard service . Hypothesis 2 . Consumers disabilities co-occurring SUD receive IPS compare comparison group 1 . ) successful achieve employment goal indicate ratio hour work desired hour work ; 2 . ) become competitively employed sooner ; 3 . ) earn high wage , 4 . ) great job satisfaction , 5 . ) great economic satisfaction ; 6 . ) great life satisfaction , 7 . ) great self-esteem , 8 . ) few day use substance follow-up point .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Individual Placement Support ( IPS ) Model
DOC.detailed_description: Hypothesis 1 . Consumers disabilities co-occurring SUD receive IPS likely competitively employ ( defined 1 day work past 30 day ) 3 , 6 12 month follow initiation vocational treatment goal compare group receive standard service . Hypothesis 2 . Consumers disabilities co-occurring SUD receive IPS compare comparison group 1 . ) successful achieve employment goal indicate ratio hour work desired hour work ; 2 . ) become competitively employed sooner ; 3 . ) earn high wage , 4 . ) great job satisfaction , 5 . ) great economic satisfaction ; 6 . ) great life satisfaction , 7 . ) great self-esteem , 8 . ) few day use substance follow-up point .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion include consumer age 1865 , able provide inform consent participation , initiate employment goal treatment plan . Exclusion criterion include anyone currently employ past 30 day , open case Ohio Rehabilitation Services Commission , open case another vocational rehabilitation provider .
